appetizers.name: Carrot Corn Soup
appetizers.description: Carrots, corn, onions and light spices

appetizers.name: Ragda Pattis Chaat
appetizers.description: Lightly spiced potato patties topped with curried white peas, tamarind and mint chutney

appetizers.name: Tandoori Chicken Wings
appetizers.description: Medium spiced chicken wings cooked in the tandoor oven.

entrees.name: Vegetable Delight
entrees.description: Eggplant, peppers, potatoes, Zucchnni, onions, in a lightly spiced medley.

entrees.name: Murg Palak Kofta
entrees.description: Lightly spiced minced chicken and fresh spinach croquets cooked in a creamy cashew sauce

entrees.name: Garlic Lamb Kadhai
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with onions, peppers, spice and a touch of freshly ground garlic.

entrees.name: Shrimp & Vegetable Vindaloo
entrees.description: Shrimps and vegetables cooked in a spicy curry sauce.
